I believe those are, the institutions are, and have always been, faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism. Mike Pence met earlier in the day with officials including Republican Gov. Mitch Daniels , who can't run for third term and also is considering whether to enter the 2012 presidential campaign. Last year, for example, SIFMA lobbied against a bill that requires marketing intermediaries, who help investment funds win multibillion-dollar deals with state pension funds, to register as lobbyists with the state.
